scientificamerican.com/2014/04/modern-sh.title: Modern Sharks May Not Be Living Fossils After All...
scientificamerican.com/2014/04/modern-sh.snippet: Sharks are usually thought of as primitive creatures, sometimes called living fossils. But a new study of a 325-million-year-old shark fossil the most complete of its kind suggests modern sharks have evolved significantly from their bony ancestors.
